a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Children in school: administrative vs. household survey data, 2017
Administrative data measures the ratio of primary school-aged children enrolled in school, while household survey data
estimates the percentage of primary-aged children attending primary education.
Administrative net primary school enrolment rate
Data source: UNESCO (via World Bank); Demographic and Health Surveys (DHS)
